Literature.Title: The effect of lipidation and glycosylation on short cationic antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Grimsey E, Collis DWP, Mikut R, Hilpert K

Literature.Title: Rational Designed Hybrid Peptides Show up to a 6-Fold Increase in Antimicrobial Activity and Demonstrate Different Ultrastructural Changes as the Parental Peptides Measured by BioSAXS.
Literature.Author: Hilpert K, Gani J, Rumancev C, Simpson N, Lopez-Perez PM, Garamus VM, von Gundlach AR, Markov P, Scocchi M, Mikut R, Rosenhahn A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=1µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=8µg/ml),Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=6µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.5µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=14µM)
